description.english: Travel the world and outer space to collect loads of treasure!
description.german: Bereise die Welt und den Weltraum und schnapp dir Schätze ohne Ende!
description.french: Parcours le monde et l'espace pour obtenir des tonnes de trésors !
description.italian: Viaggia per il mondo e nello spazio per raccogliere tanti tesori!
description.spanish: ¡Recorre el mundo y el espacio exterior para reunir montones de tesoros!
description.russian: Путешествуй по миру и в открытом космосе, чтобы собрать кучу сокровищ!
description.brazilian: Viaje o mundo e o espaço sideral para colecionar um montão de tesouros!

displayName.french: Tous les canards sur le pont

description.english: Sail the seas & discover the secret of the island of Mu!
description.german: Durchquere die Weltmeere und entdecke das Geheimnis der Insel Mu!
description.french: Vogue sur les mers et perce le secret de l'île de Mu !
description.italian: Attraversa i mari e scopri il segreto dell'isola di Mu!
description.spanish: ¡Surca los mares y descubre el secreto de la isla de Mu!
description.russian: Отправляйся в плавание и открой тайны острова Му!
description.brazilian: Navegue os mares e descubra o segredo da ilha de Mu!

description.english: Dodge Don Karnage and goons to deliver all the cargo!
description.german: Weiche Don Kanaille und seinen Handlangern aus und liefere die Fracht komplett ab!
description.french: Échappe à Don Carnage et à ses sbires pour livrer la cargaison !
description.italian: Schiva Don Massacre e i suoi sgherri per consegnare tutto il carico!
description.spanish: ¡Esquiva a Don Karnage y a sus secuaces para entregar toda la mercancía!
description.russian: Уклоняйся от Дона Карнажа и его головорезов, чтобы доставить все грузы!
description.brazilian: Desvie de Don Karnage e dos capangas para entregar toda a carga!

description.english: Defeat Steelbeak in his fiendish floating fortress!
description.german: Besiege Eisenbeiß in seiner schaurigen Schwebefestung!
description.french: Élimine Bec d'acier dans sa forteresse flottante !
description.italian: Sconfiggi Becco d'Acciaio nella sua diabolica fortezza galleggiante!
description.spanish: ¡Derrota a Picacero en su vil fortaleza flotante!
description.russian: Победи Стального Клюва в его зловещей плавающей крепости!
description.brazilian: Derrote Bico de Aço na sua diabólica fortaleza flutuante!

description.english: Save Gadget by finding Fat Cat and thwarting his diabolical scheme!
description.german: Rette Trixi, indem du Al Katzone aufspürst und seinen teuflischen Plan durchkreuzt!
description.french: Trouve Catox et déjoue ses plans diaboliques pour sauver Gadget !
description.italian: Trova Gattolardo, sventa il suo piano diabolico e salva Scheggia!
description.spanish: ¡Salva a Gadget buscando a Malacara y desbaratando sus diabólicos planes!
description.russian: Спаси Гайку, обнаружив Толстопуза и расстроив его дьявольские планы!
description.brazilian: Salve Gadget encontrando Fat Cat e acabando com o esquema diabólico dele!

description.english: Find the Urn of the Pharaoh and return Fat Cat to the slammer!
description.german: Finde die Pharaonenurne und schicke Al Katzone wieder ins Gefängnis!
description.french: Trouve l'urne du pharaon et renvoie Catox derrière les barreaux !
description.italian: Trova l'Urna del Faraone e rispedisci Gattolardo in... gattabuia!
description.spanish: ¡Encuentra la urna del faraón y haz que Malacara vuelva a estar entre rejas!
description.russian: Найди урну Фараона и отправь Толстопуза в каталажку!
description.brazilian: Encontre a Urna do Faraó e coloque Fat Cat no esmagador!

description.english: Finish all the games in The Disney Afternoon.
description.german: Beende alle Spiele im Disney-Nachmittagsspaß.
description.french: Termine tous les jeux de The Disney Afternoon.
description.italian: Completa tutti i giochi di The Disney Afternoon.
description.spanish: Acaba todos los juegos de La Tarde Disney.
description.russian: Заверши все игры в The Disney Afternoon.
description.brazilian: Conclua todos os jogos na Tarde Disney.

description.english: Complete Time Attack for DuckTales in under two hours.
description.german: Schließe den Zeitangriff (DuckTales) in unter 2 Stunden ab.
description.french: Termine le mode Chrono de La Bande à Picsou en moins de deux heures.
description.italian: Completa la sfida a tempo di DuckTales in meno di due ore.
description.spanish: Completa el modo cronometrado de Patoaventuras en menos de dos horas.
description.russian: Заверши атаку на время в DuckTales менее чем за два часа.
description.brazilian: Conclua o Ataque por Tempo no DuckTales em menos de duas horas.

description.english: Complete Time Attack for DuckTales 2 in under two hours.
description.german: Schließe den Zeitangriff (DuckTales 2) in unter 2 Stunden ab.
description.french: Termine le mode Chrono de La Bande à Picsou 2 en moins de deux heures.
description.italian: Completa la sfida a tempo di DuckTales 2 in meno di due ore.

description.russian: Заверши атаку на время в DuckTales 2 менее чем за два часа.
description.brazilian: Conclua o Ataque por Tempo no DuckTales 2 em menos de duas horas.

displayName.brazilian: O Tempo Não Espera Nem Urso

description.french: Termine le mode Chrono de Super Baloo en moins de deux heures.
description.italian: Completa la sfida a tempo di TaleSpin in meno di due ore.
description.spanish: Completa el modo cronometrado de Los Aventureros del Aire en menos de dos horas.

displayName.brazilian: Mais Rápido Que A Bala Ligeira

description.french: Termine le mode Chrono de Tic et Tac, les rangers du risque en moins de deux heures.
description.italian: Completa la sfida a tempo di Cip & Ciop agenti speciali in meno di due ore.
description.spanish: Completa el modo cronometrado de Chip y Chop: Guardianes rescatadores en menos de dos horas.
description.russian: Заверши атаку на время в Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers менее чем за два часа.
description.brazilian: Conclua o Ataque por Tempo para Tico e Teco Rescue Rangers em menos de duas horas.

description.german: Schließe den Zeitangriff (Chip und Chap – Die Ritter des Rechts 2) in unter 2 Stunden ab.
description.french: Termine le mode Chrono de Tic et Tac, les rangers du risque 2 en moins de deux heures.

description.french: Termine le mode Boss en folie de La Bande à Picsou en moins d'une heure.

description.spanish: Completa Jefes cronometrados en Patoaventuras en menos de una hora.
description.russian: Заверши битву с боссом в DuckTales менее чем за один час.

displayName.italian: Si prega di non riavvolgere il nastro
displayName.russian: Будь добр и не перематывай назад

description.english: Finish any game without rewinding.
description.german: Schließe ein beliebiges Spiel ohne Zurückspulen ab.
description.french: Termine un jeu sans revenir en arrière.
description.italian: Finisci un gioco senza riavvolgere.
description.spanish: Acaba cualquier juego sin rebobinar.
description.russian: Заверши любую игру без перемотки назад.
description.brazilian: Acabar qualquer jogo sem recomeçar.
